resources.string: International dialing code of the country you are currently in: %s
Replace \'+\' followed by the current country code with the domestic call prefix
Replace \'+\' for international calls with the international call prefix

IntlPrefix %1$s by Gaston DASSIEU-BLANCHET.

This app adds international and domestic prefixes to outgoing phone calls.

Kindly report any bugs to gdassieu@gmail.com.

os.Build.PRODUCT=%2$s
os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT=%3$d
